mean_en: determined to do something despite difficulties, especially when other people are against you and think that you are being annoying or unreasonable
sentence: You'll have to be persistent if you want to achieve anything in life. Don't stop.
sentence_trans: 如果你想在生命中完成任何目标，就必须坚持不懈。不要停止！
word_etyma: persist坚持 + ent形容词后缀 → persistent坚持的
